QuestData.Title: Wheat A Minute
QuestData.Description:
With the storage shed ransacked by rats and the giants pillaging our shipments, we've been running low on food.
When I was making my way out here, I saw a bunch of grain sacks littered about, near the wrecked wagons.
I'd appreciate it if you could retrieve whatever you find while you're out here.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Charles Davenport back in Millstone Hamlet.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to recover some of the grain?
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! I can't believe you were able to carry all of that.
